name: Outlaw Inn
description:
A 2D, top-down, faced-paced bullet hell/saloon management game!

Play as the newest barkeeper of the Outlaw Inn. A rough and tumble saloon in the heart of the old west, where the customers are thirsty and hate waiting around for their drinks! Do you have what it takes to top the global leaderboard and be the quickest drink slinger in the west?

Created by:

  • Lucas Schubert
  • James Allen
  • Gustavo Vituri
